author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Selena Gomez's 'Revival' Tour Dates Announced
text:
Comments The pop singer will kick off the tour in Las Vegas, visit Summerfest in Milwaukee and end the jaunt at Los Angeles' Staples Center. 
It's gonna be a busy year for Selena Gomez , who is releasing her second studio album " Revival " this Friday, October 9. The singer announces plans for "Revival" Tour that begins mid next year in Las Vegas and hits 41 cities across North America. "I am ready to get back on the road and see my fans in person!" Gomez said in a statement. "This album marks a new and very important chapter in my life. I cannot wait to get on stage and perform this new material." The jaunt includes a gig at next year's Summerfest. The 23-year-old pop star was the first announced performer in the opening night of the music festival that runs from June 29 to July 3 and July 5 to July 10 in Milwaukee. Tickets for the U.S. tour will go on sale October 17 at 10 A.M. ET via Ticketmaster.com. Pre-orders of the album on Gomez's website will enable fans to purchase early tickets for the tour. Gomez actually had teased "Revival" Tour last week, saying in an Instagram video , "I am launching my 'Revival' world tour. I will be going through the U.S. and Canada from May to July and then later in the year going overseas." On other news, Gomez will perform as part of the Jingle Ball L.A. lineup before hitting the road. The annual concert will be held at the Staples Center on December 4 at 7:30 P.M.
